short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a beautiful bird image every time you open a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reward yourself with a beautiful birds wallpapers each time you open a new tab.

This extension replaces the Chrome “new tab” page. When installed it will show you a high-quality bird image every time you open a new tab.

Features:

* 75 hand-picked hd photos
* Random full-page birds wallpaper for each new tab
* Links to most visited, bookmarks, history and more (you can choose which one to show/hide)
* Minimalist and no-clutter interface — just the bird wallpaper and the small menu on top (if you decide to keep it) and nothing more
* Works offline (no internet required)
